languages.text: "Презренным грешником. Ослепленный амбициями, я служил в отделении {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Адептус Администратум{/g} на своей родной планете. Я был умелым и хитрым чиновником, и мне удалось высоко взлететь — очень высоко, до самого кресла префекта. За тридцать лет я превратил свой дом из зачахшей окраинной колонии в процветающий мир. Мы богатели и процветали".

traits.locale_text: "Презренным грешником. Ослепленный амбициями, я служил в отделении Администратум на своей родной планете. Я был умелым и хитрым чиновником, и мне удалось высоко взлететь очень высоко, до самого кресла префекта. За тридцать лет я превратил свой дом из зачахшей окраинной колонии в процветающий индустриальный мир. Мы богатели и процветали".

languages.text: "A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."
languages.original_text: "Презренным грешником. Ослепленный амбициями, я служил в отделении {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Адептус Администратум{/g} на своей родной планете. Я был умелым и хитрым чиновником, и мне удалось высоко взлететь — очень высоко, до самого кресла префекта. За тридцать лет я превратил свой дом из зачахшей окраинной колонии в процветающий мир. Мы богатели и процветали".

traits.locale_text: "A wretched sinner. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my homeplanet's Administratum division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous industrial world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

"A wretched sinner. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my homeplanet's Administratum division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous industrial world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

"A wretched sinner. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's Administratum division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous industrial world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous industrial world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

"A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

languages.text: “我曾是个该死的恶棍，被我自己的野心蒙蔽了双眼。我曾在我的故乡的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国内政部{/g}任职。那时，我是个精明而狡诈的官员。我在内政部很快飞黄腾达，坐上了最高行政官的宝座。那三十年来，我把我的故乡从凋敝的边缘地区变成了繁荣的世界，我们的财富也由此迅速增长。”
languages.original_text: "A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

traits.locale_text: “我曾是个该死的罪人，被我自己的野心蒙蔽了双眼。我曾在我的故乡的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国内政部{/g}任职。那时，我是个精明而狡诈的官员。我在内政部很快飞黄腾达，坐上了最高行政官的宝座。那三十年来，我把我的故乡从凋敝的边缘地区变成了繁荣的世界，我们的财富也由此迅速增长。”

languages.text: «Fui un ser miserable. Me cegaba la ambición. Serví en la división del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} de mi planeta natal. Fui un astuto burócrata, lo que me catapultó hasta el puesto de prefecto. Treinta años tardé en convertir mi hogar, que por aquel entonces era una colonia debilitada, en un mundo próspero. Nuestra riqueza creció de la mano de nuestro ascenso».
languages.original_text: "A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

traits.locale_text: «Fui un pecador miserable. Me cegaba la ambición. Serví en la división del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} de mi planeta natal. Fui un astuto burócrata, lo que me catapultó hasta el puesto de prefecto. Treinta años tardé en convertir mi hogar, que por aquel entonces era una colonia debilitada, en un mundo próspero. Nuestra riqueza creció de la mano de nuestro ascenso».

languages.text: 「醜い悪人でした。野望に目がくらみ、故郷の惑星の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}部門に従事していました。私は抜け目のない狡猾な官吏で、総監の座まで上り詰めました。30年の間に、私は故郷を枯れ果てた辺境の植民地から豊かな世界に変えました。土地が発展するごとに、我々の富も増えていったのです」
languages.original_text: "A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

traits.locale_text: 「醜い悪人でした。野望に目がくらみ、故郷の惑星の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}部門に従事していました。私は抜け目のない狡猾な官吏で、総監の座まで上り詰めました。30年の間に、私は故郷を枯れ果てた辺境の植民地から豊かな世界に変えました。土地が発展するごとに、我々の富も増えていったのです」

languages.text: "Ein verkommener Teufel. Geblendet von Ehrgeiz, diente ich in der Abteilung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} auf meinem Heimatplaneten. Ich war ein kluger und raffinierter Bürokrat und stieg rasch auf, bis zur Position des Präfekten. Binnen dreißig Jahren verwandelte ich meine Heimat aus einer kümmerlichen Grenzkolonie in eine wohlhabende Welt. Wir gediehen und unser Reichtum wuchs."
languages.original_text: "A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

traits.locale_text: "Ein verkommener Sünder. Geblendet von Ehrgeiz, diente ich in der Abteilung des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} auf meinem Heimatplaneten. Ich war ein kluger und raffinierter Bürokrat und stieg rasch auf, bis zur Position des Präfekten. Binnen dreißig Jahren verwandelte ich meine Heimat aus einer kümmerlichen Grenzkolonie in eine wohlhabende Welt. Wir gediehen und unser Reichtum wuchs."

languages.text: « Un misérable monstre. Aveuglé par mes ambitions, je servais autrefois dans le département de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} de ma planète natale. J'étais un bureaucrate aguerri et sournois, et j'ai gravi les échelons sans peine jusqu'à devenir préfet. En trente ans, j'ai fait de ma lointaine colonie à bout de souffle un monde prospère. Nous étions chaque jour un peu plus riche. »
languages.original_text: "A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

traits.locale_text: « Un misérable pécheur. Aveuglé par mes ambitions, je servais autrefois dans le département de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} de ma planète natale. J'étais un bureaucrate aguerri et sournois, et j'ai gravi les échelons sans peine jusqu'à devenir préfet. En trente ans, j'ai fait de ma lointaine colonie à bout de souffle un monde prospère. Nous étions chaque jour un peu plus riche. »

languages.text: "Sefil bir zebaniydim. Hırsımdan kör olmuş hâlde gezegenimin {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} dairesinde görev yaptım. Kurnaz ve sinsi bir bürokrattım, büyük başarılar kaydederek en nihayetinde prefekt koltuğuna dek yükseldim. Otuz yıl içinde yuvamı silik bir kenar kolonisinden zengin bir dünyaya dönüştürdüm. Gezegen serpildikçe servetimiz de arttı."
languages.original_text: "A wretched fiend. Blinded by my ambitions, I served in my home planet's {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} division. I was a shrewd and sly bureaucrat, and I soared to great heights, to the very chair of prefect. In thirty years, I turned my home from a withered fringe colony into a prosperous world. Our wealth grew as we bloomed."

traits.locale_text: "Sefil bir hayvan. Tutkularımın esiri olmuş bir hâlde yurdum olan gezegenin {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} dairesinde hizmet verdim. Kurnaz ve sinsi bir bürokrattım, büyük aşamalar kaydettim, en nihayetinde başkanlık koltuğuna kadar uzandım. Otuz yıl içinde yuvamı solmuş bir kenar kolonisinden zengin bir dünyaya dönüştürdüm. Gezegen serpildikçe servetimiz de artı."
